hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.jp: ゲテモノ料理を食べること、作ること
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 制作古怪食物、吃古怪食物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 制作黑暗料理、享用黑暗料理
美食探店、制作美食清单

name.zh_cn: 不请自来的{cn美食研究会}（１）

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society came to sell corn to find out why the corn eaten at the beach is so delicious. The Prefect Team fights to prevent the Gourmet Research Society's disturbance.
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society came to sell corn to find out why the corn eaten at the beach is so delicious. The Prefect Team fights to prevent the Gourmet Research Society's disturbance.
desc.zh_cn: 为什么海边和庆典上烤玉米会那么好吃呢……为了找出其中原因，{cn美食研究会}在全面战争之际卖起了烤玉米。女孩们见到{cf阳奈}委员长不在场，为了不让美食研究被妨碍，将枪口对准了{cn风纪委员会}。

name.en: An Average Day at the Beach
name.jp: An Average Day at the Beach

name.zh_cn: 不请自来的{cn美食研究会}（２）

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
